description: Permission to develop 16 townhouse units at the specified addresses. Rezoning from 'Single Detached (RS1/E)' and 'Two-Unit Dwellings (RD1)' zones to the 'Low Density Townhouses (RTL4)' zone for this project under Bylaw 10081 (RZ 18-839945), which is currently at third reading. Servicing Agreement required as a condition of Building Permit issuance including various improvements such as sidewalk removal and replacement, driveway crossings replacement, and construction of a new driveway crossing designed to provide 'right in, right out' access to the site.

Construction of 16 townhouse units on a site zoned 'Low Density Townhouses (RTL4)'. Front yard setback along Steveston Highway proposed to be reduced from 6.0 m to 4.50 m. Rezoning from 'Single Detached (RS1/E)' and 'Two-Unit Dwellings (RD1)' zones to the 'Low Density Townhouses (RTL4)' zone.

The application is for a three-storey light industrial and ancillary office building of approximately 3,748 m2 containing 11 strata-titled units on a new lot created through subdivision on the west portion of the site. The site is zoned "Industrial Business Park (ZI3) - Crestwood Area (East Cambie)". The proposal aligns with the City's objectives of intensifying existing industrial lands. The proposal also involves land restoration within the existing Riparian Management Area (RMA) along the south side of the site, as well as improvements to pedestrian circulation and landscaping within the surface parking area on Lot 2.
